hero.subtitle: Hi, I'm Alex
hero.title: Full Stack Web Developer
hero.introduction: I create functional web applications focused in performance, aesthetics, and efficiency, keeping the code clean and easy to maintain.

tasks: Collaborated in the development of a team vacation management application, optimizing the process and reducing manual tasks by more than 50%.
Developed a REST API using Spring Boot to manage communication between the vacation management application and the database.
Optimized emails, landing pages, and automated campaigns in Hubspot, resulting in an increase in lead conversion.
Developed an internal application for managing courses, users, and the issuance of training certificates using PHP, Laravel and React, reducing administrative time and manual work.

projects.cliDescription: Professional CLI tool that scaffolds Electron-vite projects with the user’s chosen framework and optional integrations.
projects.apiarchiveDescription: Simple resource for discovering different kinds of APIs with search, category browsing, and pagination.
projects.toolsydeDescription: Toolbox style application based on microservices with a variety of utilities for developers.
projects.mobeliaDescription: Modern furniture e-commerce with responsive design, shopping cart, secure payments, and social authentication.
projects.sourceButtonAria: Go to the project's code in GitHub

contact.subtitle: Like what you see?
contact.title: Get in touch
contact.text: Contact me through my email address or send me a message through LikedIn social media.
contact.locationText: Available for remote work or relocation.
contact.availabilityText: I reply to messages in 24 - 48 hours.
